This is Hirai Miyo from Beyond Seasonings, Halo! I'm going to start talking a little bit about each other.
I'm going to ask you some questions, so don't think too much and answer them quickly.
The second photo book "Belief" will be released on April 10.
What kind of photos do you feel you have grown since your first photo book? The ones where my abs and back muscles are leaking.
What is your favorite musical play and character that you would like to see performed?
And Jackie from Me & My Girl. What do you like to do these days? Watching video games.
What is your secret to not becoming a 3-day monk?
Take the long view!
This summer marks the 5th anniversary of Beyooooonds's major label debut.
The moment I heard the announcement at the release event of our major label debut that we were No.1 on Oricon!
I was so excited! Thank you very much.
There were a few things that caught my attention. First of all, congratulations on your second photo book!
Your abs and back muscles are amazing!
I've been going to the gym, and I've been thinking about how to reduce body fat and build muscle mass, and I've been working on my diet.
There were a lot of shots where the light was really good and there were shadows, and I think that's where I've grown since the last time, so please pay attention.
And this is connected to what I was saying earlier about Mio-chan, she is very stoic.
I asked you a while ago how to avoid becoming a 3-day monk. Well, I think it's easy to set a goal of three days, but I don't think it's a hurdle to overcome.
But it's not just a matter of continuing for three days. If you take a day off, you can start again the next day, and have the courage to switch on and off.
Continuation is the most important thing, so it's okay to take a break.
It's important to be able to resume afterwards. I'm a little motivated now.
I tend to be a three-day monk, but you're right, it's okay to take a break.
I see. Thank you, Ms. Hirai. I'll do my best.

Beyooooonds Seasonings' Michiyo Hirai presents "Halo! Sta.
It's time to say goodbye!
Here is an announcement!
Hina Fest 2024 will be held on March 30th and 31st at Makuhari Messe.
We are looking forward to seeing you all there!
We are also looking forward to seeing you all at the "Carbon Neutral 2024 by Satomi Satoyama Movement" on March 30 and 31 at Makuhari Messe.
We will be releasing Miyo Hirai's second photo book, BELIEF, on April 10. We have been working hard for the past 5 months to get it ready, so we hope you will be able to pick it up!
Hello Project 25th Anniversary Concert Theme of Hello all for one and one for all is now available on Blu-ray!
It's really a concert to commemorate the 25th anniversary, so please watch it!
Biophonic2 will be held on April 6th at the Tokyo Metropolitan Art Space and on May 10th at the Kobe International Conference Center.
We hope to spend a wonderful time with you all!
Beyooooonds's first live house tour, and we are looking forward to seeing you there.
